Compatible with iOS 8 to 13

TintIconLabel Gives the Opportunity to Get Custom Colors for the Text and the Highlight of your Icons Labels!

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!


See larger Screenshots below..

Version 1.0.4 - Already working on iOS 13 too. - Added the option to Make the Icons Labels Showing the Battery Percentage (Featured BatteryIconLabel Available on My Repo). - Code Changes/Improvements. Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Hide All the Icons Images.
- Added the option to Show the Updated Blue Dots in All the Icons Labels.
- Added the option to Hide the Updated Blue Dots in All the Icons Labels.
